name: Rede Run
description:
One day there is a hero named rede
He is going to adventure everywhere
in one day he get in enemy’s base
Because he in it he must get escape by killing boss
Now he is in your hand
get escape or lose

If you want download it you can download here:
Windows 32-Bit: https://sherwin.itch.io/rede-run-for-windows-32-bit
